direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve geometric calculations related to line segments but focus on different aspects (intersection vs. distance).
The method directly supports the functionality of intersectsLine by determining if two line segments intersect.
Both methods involve geometric calculations and use similar control flows for determining relative positions.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of Line2D objects is required for both intersectsLine and other geometric methods.
This method is directly invoked within intersectsLine to determine intersection.
Both methods handle geometric calculations and can be used to verify the correctness of geometric operations.
